title: Award-winning Short Breaks to Disneyland, Paris by Coach (Avion Bell)
text: By Avion Bell Jul 29, 2015 Coach holidays have become an incredibly popular way of travelling throughout Europe. Coach holidays to Paris is one of them. Paris is one of the Europe's greatest cities. Those planning to go on a trip to Paris often find it difficult to select a hotel at the right budget. A coach holiday is an excellent way of seeing the finest sights of this beautiful city. Coach holidays offer an excellent means of visiting the city. The general format of such holidays generally includes you being picked up from a location close to your home and then being driven to Paris, making use of a ferry or train. Tour operators have often been operating these types of holidays for a number of years, allowing them to gain good experience in the relative quality of the local hotels. One of the most important advantages of a coach holiday is that you will have access to a tour guide. Having a guide who has a good working knowledge of the city can be a real bonus, allowing you to find out more about Paris than would usually be the case. With a coach tour itinerary built to include visits to all of the main sights in the city, you can also relax into your holiday, knowing that you won't be missing out the major attractions. After a long and stressful week a short break to Paris is a great option for a relaxing weekend. A perfectly planned short trip to a Paris for a couple of days is not only exciting but refreshing as well. How about a trip to Disneyland, Paris and have a vacation you will never forget. Disneyland is the ideal place for family vacation, no matter which location you choose, but the Paris location is a stunning place to bring every member of your family. Everything about a Disneyland resort is geared towards the enjoyment of every member of the family, from the smallest child to the oldest adult. The first park that you will visit is the Disneyland Paris Park. This park was designed with the classic Disney theme in mind. It has all the famous Disney characters that we know. Next, head on over to Walt Disney Studios park for a trip into the world of movies. You will find plenty of entertainment on the display in this park. Disney village is the third park in Disneyland Resorts Paris. This park will give you an American experience that you will find nowhere else in Europe. The Disneyland Resorts Paris is a fabulous holiday destination with many attractions and events that are designed for every member of your family. The children will enjoy the classic characters that are there to entertain them on the holiday. There is dancing and dining for adults to enjoy during the holiday, which makes it a spectacular time for all. Short breaks to Disneyland Paris is a wonderful destination for your next family holiday. Book your trip now and prepare yourself for an exciting time for everyone. About the Author
